summary: This dispatch discusses the debriefing of an individual (Subject) removed from CAC. The debriefing focused on his relationship with Cuba and other security organizations. The subject claimed no relationship with Cuban C-2 but admitted knowing Ramiro VALOI. He was granted asylum in Uruguay in 1962. The subject also admitted to criminal activities in Los Angeles and involvement in an attempt to take items out of the country in April 1961.
title: DISPATCH Chile
